\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 883}

\subsection*{Get Beautiful}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Becky}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   &  & 5-MeO-DMT & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 170.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}

Get Beautiful



Closer, 

Minds open easy-

get beautiful, 

more useful, if flowers grow

in the unconsious.

Serenity siezes you quickly

impaling your evils, 

holding them to a clearer light

which causes hate to dissipate. 



It's time to reconsider, 

time to renegotiate-

reality,

as a whole

And then with eyes fully open

maybe the mind dances naturally. 

Like colors that breath, 

the same as i do 

when ever sleep brings struggle, 

and then sanity.



Believe- 

you are divine, 

concieve now

all anger benign. 

Within the world where peace pulses 

through my body. 



Endlessly, 

or ten minutes that comes in the pretence of forever. 

Without malignance,

with holding reason-

and still nothing at all. 



With passion that makes you alive 

and god inside of you, 

glorifying your mind 

and limbs

and nerves. 

through spasms of shiva

flowing always in you. 

Realize your breath-

get beautiful.





yeah, i think i liked it.

\end{document}
